summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3247 for the improvement of Alley in Block 16, Brooklyn Addition, being the alley between 11th Avenue Northeast and 12th Avenue Northeast, from East 41st Street to East 42nd Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 40263, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
